items.title: Legal Intern
items.info: Student makes at least 1 correct objection within a single case.

items.title: Law Clerk
items.info: Student has selected only relevant evidence within a single case.

items.title: Associate Attorney
items.info: Student correctly completes the reasoning wheel 2 times within a single case.

items.title: Lead Attorney
items.info: Student has selected relevant Supreme Court or Constitution support at least 2 times within the first 3 turns within a single case.
